column4: lucidguy: I've been really happy with my asus EEE 1000 - lots of support for that
Just the other day someone told me they had issues with their Eee PC .. and only Karmic supported all the hardware.
thats what I thought .. since the original Eee PCs came with linux.
Just something to surf/movies ..  nothing crazy.  Maybe the odd simple old school strategy games like simcity.
